examples.example: 当朋友伤心时，我会给她一个温暖的抱抱你。

translate.english: When a friend is sad, I will give her a warm hug.

examples.example: 当你遇到困难时，我很想给你一个抱抱你，给予你鼓励和支持。

translate.english: When you encounter difficulties, I really want to give you a hug and give you encouragement and support.

examples.example: 当我看到小朋友哭泣时，我会轻轻地抱抱你，给予安慰。

translate.english: When I see children crying, I will hug you gently and give comfort.
